description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Against the backdrop of deep space, a fiery flower blossoms... and fades. More appear; then they, too, are gone. Around you, the world is painted with the colors of war. Can you survive? With 8 game modes and 8 weapons, A New Threat is full of fun, fast action! Fly against your friends as each vies to become king of the skies, or band together to protect mankind! How long can you survive?!
